meanings.meaning_en_US: Two individuals of the same sort considered together.

examples.sentence: They are a lovely [couple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們是一對可愛的情侶。

examples.sentence: A [couple] of friends joined us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 幾個朋友加入我們的晚餐。

examples.sentence: She gave a [couple] of reasons for her decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為自己的決定給出了幾個理由。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visual representation of data.

examples.sentence: He created a [chart] to visualize the sales data.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他創建了一個圖表來視覺化銷售數據。

examples.sentence: The [chart] shows trends over the last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張圖表顯示了過去一年的趨勢。

examples.sentence: Students must learn to read a [chart] in math class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生必須學會在數學課上閱讀圖表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To organize information visually.

examples.sentence: We will [chart] the progress of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將繪製項目的進展。

examples.sentence: She decided to [chart] her financial goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定繪製她的財務目標。

examples.sentence: The team will [chart] the timeline for the launch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊將繪製發佈的時間表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large body of people united by common descent, history, culture, or language.

examples.sentence: Every [nation] has its own culture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個國家都有自己的文化

examples.sentence: The [nation] celebrated its independence.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該國慶祝其獨立

examples.sentence: A strong [nation] stands together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一個強大的國家團結在一起

meanings.meaning_en_US: A planned piece of work aimed at achieving specific goals.

examples.sentence: The [project] will take six months to complete.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目需要六個月才能完成

examples.sentence: We need to present the [project] outcomes next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要在下周展示項目的結果

examples.sentence: This [project] involves multiple departments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目涉及多個部門

meanings.meaning_en_US: A communication sent from one person or group to another.

examples.sentence: I received a [message] from my friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從朋友那裡收到了一條信息

examples.sentence: The [message] was clear and concise.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 信息既清晰又簡潔

examples.sentence: Can you send a [message] to her?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能給她發一條信息嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person whom one does not know or with whom one is not familiar.

examples.sentence: He felt uncomfortable speaking to a [stranger].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對與陌生人交談感到不安

examples.sentence: The [stranger] offered her help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那位陌生人主動提供幫助

examples.sentence: It's not safe to talk to a [stranger] at night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在晚上與陌生人交談是不安全的

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ability to do something well; expertise.

examples.sentence: She has a great [skill] in painting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在繪畫方面有很大的技能。

examples.sentence: Developing [skill] takes time and practice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 發展技能需要時間和練習。

examples.sentence: His [skill] in negotiation is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在談判方面的技能令人印象深刻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Preferred before all others of the same kind.

examples.sentence: Chocolate is my [favorite] flavor of ice cream.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 巧克力是我最喜愛的冰淇淋口味。

examples.sentence: She chose her [favorite] book to read.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她選擇了她最喜愛的書來讀。

examples.sentence: Playing soccer is my [favorite] pastime.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 踢足球是我最喜愛的消遣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To receive payment for work done or services provided.

examples.sentence: You can [earn] money by working part-time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以通過兼職工作賺取金錢。

examples.sentence: She hopes to [earn] a promotion soon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她希望不久能獲得晉升。

examples.sentence: Many people [earn] a living through freelancing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人通過自由職業維持生計。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To clean (an area) by brushing away dirt or litter.

examples.sentence: She decided to sweep the floor before the guests arrived.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定在客人來之前掃地。

examples.sentence: He used a broom to sweep the leaves off the porch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用掃帚把門廊上的樹葉掃掉。

examples.sentence: They will sweep the area to collect litter after the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 活動結束後，他們會掃除區域以收集垃圾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An aim or desired result that a person or group strives to achieve.

examples.sentence: My [goal] is to learn a new language this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的目標是在今年學會一種新語言。

examples.sentence: Setting a clear [goal] can help you stay focused.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 設定明確的目標可以幫助你保持專注。

examples.sentence: They scored the winning [goal] in the last minute.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在最後一分鐘打入了制勝球。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A movement made by lifting one foot and putting it down in a new position.

examples.sentence: Take a big [step] forward.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 向前邁出大步

examples.sentence: She missed a [step] and stumbled.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她錯過了台階而絆倒了

examples.sentence: Let's go through each [step] of the process.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 讓我們逐步進行每個流程

meanings.meaning_en_US: A goal or objective to aim at.

examples.sentence: Our main [target] is to increase sales this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們的主要目標是今年增加銷售

examples.sentence: The dart hit the bullseye of the [target].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 飛鏢打中了目標的紅心

examples.sentence: They set a [target] for the project completion date.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為項目完成日期設定了一個目標

meanings.meaning_en_US: To aim or direct toward a target.

examples.sentence: Make sure to [target] your efforts wisely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保你的努力明智地對準

examples.sentence: The campaign will [target] specific demographics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該活動將針對特定的人口統計

examples.sentence: He [targeted] the wrong audience for his product.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為他的產品對準了錯誤的受眾

meanings.meaning_en_US: The land along the edge of a large body of water.

examples.sentence: The children played on the [shore].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在海岸上玩耍。

examples.sentence: We walked along the [shore] at sunset.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在日落時沿著海岸散步。

examples.sentence: The waves crashed against the [shore].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海浪衝擊著海岸。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A substance that flows freely and is not solid or gaseous.

examples.sentence: Water is a common [liquid] found on Earth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水是地球上常見的液體。

examples.sentence: The [liquid] spilled all over the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 液體潑灑到了桌子上。

examples.sentence: She poured the [liquid] into the glass.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把液體倒進杯子裡。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process or activity of writing or naming the letters of a word.

examples.sentence: His [spelling] is excellent; he rarely makes mistakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的拼寫非常出色；他很少犯錯。

examples.sentence: I need to improve my [spelling] before the test.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要在考試前提高我的拼寫。

examples.sentence: The teacher gave us a [spelling] test every week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師每週給我們一次拼寫測試。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An unforeseen and unplanned event or circumstance, typically resulting in damage or injury.

examples.sentence: She was involved in a car [accident].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她捲入了一起車禍。

examples.sentence: The [accident] caused significant delays on the highway.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這起意外導致高速公路上出現重大延誤。

examples.sentence: Thankfully, no serious injuries resulted from the [accident].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 幸好這起意外沒有造成嚴重傷害。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating a choice between alternatives.

examples.sentence: I can't decide [whether] to go or stay.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我無法決定是去還是留

examples.sentence: She asked [whether] I wanted tea or coffee.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她問我想要茶還是咖啡

examples.sentence: It’s unclear [whether] he will attend the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不清楚他是否會參加會議
